scripts.pg-migrate: npm run build-prisma-schema && npx prisma migrate dev --name $npm_config_name
scripts.build: npm run build-prisma-schema && npm run build-ts && npm run eslint && echo Build finished!
scripts.restore-global: npm install -g typescript eslint typings nodemon pm2
scripts.restore-all: npm run restore-global && npm run restore-local
scripts.docker-run: npm run build  && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml build && RUNNING_MODE=development  docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml up -d --remove-orphans --build --force-recreate
scripts.docker-run:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml build && RUNNING_MODE=development docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --remove-orphans --build --force-recreate
